name: Sweet Tooth (CrookedBlackHeart)
description:
Andy's planet Carnassia is suffering a debilitating sugar famine. In order to save all molarkind, he's on a mission. He has to leave home and search space for lost and stolen treats. Teeth are not capable rocket engineers, and Andy finds himself hurtling faster and faster through space. Candy-hoarding enemies are plenty, but their irregular shooting aids in Andy's favor. Andy must collect as many treats as he can in the ultimate out-of-control sugar rush.

Instructions: use the arrow keys to direct Andy as he careens through space. Collect treats as they appear in space or from destroyed foe.

Power-ups
Fluoride - Swish-Swish
Whiskey - Andy loves bourbon and he loves how it makes him invisible even more
Star - Absorb the elusive star and become Mighty-Molar

Baddies
Brent the dead tooth - Brent has gone a little bit sick from eating too much sugar
Flossiraptor - This disturbed raptor has been flossing for millions of years
Aliens - Candy-obsessed visitors steal the sweets for their planet

GMTK gamejam 2020 submission. The theme was "Out of Control."  Turning left or right is the only thing the player can control.  They have no power over when they shoot, how fast they are going, and just about everything else.  It's pretty out of control.  

Hope you like it!
